sentences.en: Brezhnev could not forgo extended commentary to several old acquaintances.
sentences.cn: 勃列日涅夫不愿停止同几位熟人没完没了的交谈.

sentences.en: Do not, for repulse, forgo the purpose you resolved to effort.
sentences.cn: 不要因为你一次的挫折就放弃你原来决心要达到的目标.

sentences.en: For the safety of your data, forgo rebooting any data recovery program.
sentences.cn: 为了您的数据安全, 放弃任何数据重新启动恢复程序.

sentences.en: I shall be happy to forgo his company.
sentences.cn: 我将乐于放弃跟他作伴.

sentences.en: I'll have to forgo my vacation in order to attend a summer Chinese course.
sentences.cn: 为了参加暑期中文班我只好放弃暑假.

sentences.en: Many skiers are happy to forgo a summer vacation to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 许多滑雪者乐于放弃暑假去滑雪。

sentences.en: Mary decided to forgo the movies and do her lessons.
sentences.cn: 玛丽决定放弃看电影而去作她的功课.

sentences.en: Others forgo animal foods out of a simple regard for life.
sentences.cn: 其他人放弃动物性的食物是出于对生命的一种单纯的尊重.

sentences.en: She decided to forgo dessert for a few days.
sentences.cn: 她决定几天不吃甜点心.

sentences.en: She would willingly forgo a birthday treat if only her warring parents would declare a truce.
sentences.cn: 只要她的父母停止争吵,她愿意放弃生日宴请.

sentences.en: That may be harder than getting them forgo furs or bear - bile medicines.
sentences.cn: 不过这可能比让人们放弃皮毛或者熊胆汁做的药更困难些.

sentences.en: The workers agreed to forgo a pay increase for the sake of greater job security.
sentences.cn: 工人们为了工作更保险,同意放弃增加工资的要求.

sentences.en: There are often pro - competitive reasons to forgo short - term profits.
sentences.cn: 放弃 短期 利润常常是为了在竞争中获得更有利的地位.

sentences.en: Top executives at Goldman Sachs are to forgo bonuses this year.
sentences.cn: 高盛集团的高阶主管自愿放弃今年的奖金.

sentences.en: You will have to forgo alcohol.

trans.tran_en: to not do or have something pleasant or enjoyable

trans.tran_cn: 放弃， 抛弃； 作罢
trans.tran_en: to not do or have something pleasant or enjoyable
